conviction_based_drafting.principle: Target your actual favorite players rather than consensus 'safe' picks
examples: Travis Hunter at 1.02 - must-have player fell into lap
Luther Burden reach at 1.11 - traded Fields to get his guy
Early identification of Ladd McConkey before market caught up
conviction_based_drafting.emotional_payoff: Building roster with players you genuinely love creates deeper satisfaction
conviction_based_drafting.application: Home leagues especially - bragging rights with your actual favorites beats optimal but boring

strategic_patience_in_rebuilds.principle: Teardown positioning can be championship foundation if executed properly
process: Accept 2nd to last position for maximum draft capital
Convert veterans to assets (Puka trade, Fields to 1.11)
Target youth with elite situations (McCarthy + KOC system)
strategic_patience_in_rebuilds.timeline: 2-3 year competitive window planning vs immediate gratification
strategic_patience_in_rebuilds.application: Dynasty rebuilds require discipline to position for future rather than patch current holes

market_inefficiency_identification.principle: Act when you see value before consensus catches up
examples: Puka acquisition when market assumed Kupp would return to form
Tyler Warren steal at 2.04 when projected much higher
J.J. McCarthy trade for long-term superflex value
market_inefficiency_identification.timing: Strike when you have conviction but market hasn't adjusted
market_inefficiency_identification.application: Trust your analysis over popular opinion when backed by evidence

positional_injury_assumptions.lesson: Don't let positional injury narratives drive all roster decisions
positional_injury_assumptions.example: Achane trade based on RB safety fears - then Puka gets hurt instead
positional_injury_assumptions.balance: Consider injury risk but don't let it override value analysis
positional_injury_assumptions.application: Process over results - evaluate decisions based on information available at time

tiber_questions.roster_construction: How do you balance emotional connection to players vs pure analytical optimization?
tiber_questions.rebuild_timeline: What's the optimal teardown approach for different league contexts?
tiber_questions.market_timing: How do you identify when market inefficiencies are actionable vs temporary?
tiber_questions.conviction_vs_consensus: When should personal player evaluation override expert consensus rankings?

best_applications.home_leagues: Conviction-based building especially valuable for emotional investment and bragging rights
best_applications.dynasty_formats: Long-term thinking allows for strategic positioning and patient asset conversion
best_applications.superflex_leagues: QB foundation building through youth and situation analysis
best_applications.rebuild_scenarios: Convert veteran assets to youth with better long-term timelines
best_applications.community_platforms: Help users identify their 'conviction players' rather than just consensus rankings
